QuestData.Title: Springing the Trap
QuestData.Description: We owe this opportunity in great part to your efforts, $n.$b$bIt is only fitting that you initiate the attack on Malygos.$b$bTake this spark and use it to light the signal fire northwest of the Nexus. Keristrasza will direct you from there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Raelorasz wants you to use Raelorasz' Spark at the signal fire in Coldarra.
QuestData.RewardText: We have dealt a blow to Malygos, but it has come at a high price.
